column4: I hope 9.10 runs better than  9.04 cos its running like a dog
it randomly freezes, things are running slow
Yeah ive never gone well  upgrading ubuntu , thats why im installing fresh

But back to answering  your original question; Identify your /home partition. Set its mount point as '/home' and make sure that Format is not ticked. Continue installation as normal until you reach the Who are you? stage, enter a
